description:
A simple way to get All Currencies, Get Specific Currency, BTC Against and Compare Currencies

We can also talk if there if you want a custom one, just shoot an email to clasicwebtools [@] gmail.com

Check it out at https://bubble.io/page?type=page&name=currency&id=clasic-plugins&test_plugin=1667513822707x631845431238721500_current&tab=tabs-1
name: Ultimate Currency Toolkit
plugin_instructions:
1 - Download the plugin
2 - set where to use the data
3 - set the dynamic variables
